CustomField.formula:
Round( IF(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.Configuration_Segment__c,"Express"), IF(SBQQ__Quote__r.Renewal__c , (SBQQ__NetPrice__c * 12/SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c) , ((SBQQ__NetPrice__c * 12/SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c) * 90/100)) ,
IF(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c < 12, SBQQ__NetPrice__c , (SBQQ__NetPrice__c * 12/SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c) )) * IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Type ,'Remorse Refund'),ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Type ,'Rebate')) && CreatedDate >= DATETIMEVALUE("2024-11-03 00:00:00") , SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c , SBQQ__Quantity__c) ,2)
CustomField.label: Total Annual Price
